name: Memoria (itch) (Adouphoof, Kim Reynolds)
description:
The Memoria game demo was developed for Github Game Off 2022 by Kim, Mitch, and Dan. All of the assets were made by our team. If you would like more information on our team members, navigate to the credits page of the title screen. This is our first game jam and although we didn't finish everything we'd planned, hopefully you can still enjoy the world we're building!

If you're interested in the artwork of Memoria, please check out: Memoria Project.
